Package soldier_types

Class Units

java.lang.Object
soldier_types.Units
All Implemented Interfaces:
DefaultRandomFactors
Direct Known Subclasses:
Archers, Cavalry, HeavyInfantry, LightInfantry, Pikemen
public abstract class Units
extends java.lang.Object
implements DefaultRandomFactors
Class Units is a superclass for more specific unit types. Class Units is abstract
Version:
1.3
Author:
Viktor Szitkey
